medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent worsening left upper quadrant (LUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain has been present for an unspecified number of days, worsening with food intake and radiating to the back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic Hepatitis C, Diabetes Mellitus Type 2, inflammatory arthropathy, episcleritis.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with colon cancer, sister with lung cancer, father with prostate cancer, brother with unknown throat cancer.
